title: interface 'sabre_dav_inode' not found
body:
i am running owncloud master. i was playing with the files app and i deleted a folder. the delete wasn't successful and when i logged in again in owncloud, i got the error reported below.
i looked for that file in the 3rdparty folder, everything seems to be on place, but i still get the error :(

fatal error: interface 'sabre_dav_inode' not found in /var/www/owncloud/lib/connector/sabre/node.php on line 24 call stack: 0.0002 637544 1. {main}() /var/www/owncloud/index.php:0 0.0168 4148904 2. oc::handlerequest() /var/www/owncloud/index.php:28 0.0440 7095456 3. oc::loadappscriptfile() /var/www/owncloud/lib/base.php:628 0.0446 7180480 4. require_once('/var/www/owncloud/apps/files/index.php') /var/www/owncloud/lib/base.php:647 0.0520 8501576 5. oc\files\filesystem::getdirectorycontent() /var/www/owncloud/apps/files/index.php:60 0.0520 8501712 6. oc\files\view->getdirectorycontent() /var/www/owncloud/lib/files/filesystem.php:660 0.0557 9411232 7. oc\files\cache\watcher->checkupdate() /var/www/owncloud/lib/files/view.php:772 0.0561 9414816 8. oc\files\cache\scanner->scan() /var/www/owncloud/lib/files/cache/watcher.php:48 0.0561 9415208 9. oc\files\cache\scanner->scanfile() /var/www/owncloud/lib/files/cache/scanner.php:110 0.0561 9415288 10. oc\files\cache\scanner->getdata() /var/www/owncloud/lib/files/cache/scanner.php:69 0.0562 9416296 11. oc\files\storage\common->getetag() /var/www/owncloud/lib/files/cache/scanner.php:53 0.0562 9416800 12. oc\autoloader->load() /var/www/owncloud/lib/autoloader.php:0 0.0565 9498376 13. require_once('/var/www/owncloud/lib/connector/sabre/node.php') /var/www/owncloud/lib/autoloader.php:120
